channel.title: New videos for the day: news

item.title: 'These are very strong hands' Trump dismisses small hands talk, 2016
item.description: Trump addresses small hands comments made by Republican rival Marco Rubio in March of 2016.

media:content.media:title: 'These are very strong hands' Trump dismisses small hands talk, 2016
media:content.description: Trump addresses small hands comments made by Republican rival Marco Rubio in March of 2016.

item.title: Plaid Cymru peer who wants to scrap the House of Lords is sworn in
item.description: Carmen Smith who at 28 is the youngest peer in the House of Lords is sworn in representing Plaid Cymru after revealing her goals to abolish the organisation.

media:content.media:title: Plaid Cymru peer who wants to scrap the House of Lords is sworn in
media:content.description: Carmen Smith who at 28 is the youngest peer in the House of Lords is sworn in representing Plaid Cymru after revealing her goals to abolish the organisation.

item.title: Idaho inmates escape from hospital after shooting three officers
item.description: Idaho prison inmates, Nicholas Umphenour and Skylar Meade, escape from Boise hospital after shooting three officers.

media:content.media:title: Idaho inmates escape from hospital after shooting three officers
media:content.description: Idaho prison inmates, Nicholas Umphenour and Skylar Meade, escape from Boise hospital after shooting three officers.

item.title: Queen Camilla smiles as little boy steals the show in Belfast

item.title: Fort Worth PD release statement after SB4 bill is blocked

item.title: Mum accidentally broadcasts herself naked on Zoom at funeral
item.description: The 48-year-old businesswoman and personal trainer had opened a Zoom link so she could livestream the service without realising her camera was on. When the stream went live, the mum-of-two's showering was shown to hundreds of stunned mourners.

media:content.media:title: Mum accidentally broadcasts herself naked on Zoom at funeral
media:content.description: The 48-year-old businesswoman and personal trainer had opened a Zoom link so she could livestream the service without realising her camera was on. When the stream went live, the mum-of-two's showering was shown to hundreds of stunned mourners.

item.title: Woman who died of cancer leaves message urging law change
item.description: Paola Marra leaves behind a message for politicians, pleading for a change to the UK's current 'cruel law' criminalising assisted dying, before she passed away.

media:content.media:title: Woman who died of cancer leaves message urging law change
media:content.description: Paola Marra leaves behind a message for politicians, pleading for a change to the UK's current 'cruel law' criminalising assisted dying, before she passed away.

item.title: AOC asks Tony Bobulinski 'exactly' what crimes Joe Biden is guilty of
item.description: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez asks Hunter Biden ex-associate Tony Bobulinski 'exactly' what crimes Joe Biden is guilty of in an exchange at an impeachment hearing.

media:content.media:title: AOC asks Tony Bobulinski 'exactly' what crimes Joe Biden is guilty of
media:content.description: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez asks Hunter Biden ex-associate Tony Bobulinski 'exactly' what crimes Joe Biden is guilty of in an exchange at an impeachment hearing.

item.title: President Zelensky says five killed by Russian missile in Kharkiv
item.description: President Vladmir Zelensky has reported that five deaths occurred in Kharkiv from a Russian missile strike today.

media:content.media:title: President Zelensky says five killed by Russian missile in Kharkiv
media:content.description: President Vladmir Zelensky has reported that five deaths occurred in Kharkiv from a Russian missile strike today.

item.title: CCTV captures 'petrol bombing of car and house with family inside'
item.description: Terrifying CCTV shows the alleged petrol bombing of a car and house - while the occupants were inside. The car and front door to the house were left blackened and smouldering in the attack in Hemswell Cliff on 11 July 2023.

media:content.media:title: CCTV captures 'petrol bombing of car and house with family inside'
media:content.description: Terrifying CCTV shows the alleged petrol bombing of a car and house - while the occupants were inside. The car and front door to the house were left blackened and smouldering in the attack in Hemswell Cliff on 11 July 2023.

item.title: David Cameron and Australian foreign minister ink out defense tie
item.description: Foreign Minister David Cameron met with Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to discuss defense ties between the UK and Australia as global conflict largely increases.

media:content.media:title: David Cameron and Australian foreign minister ink out defense tie
media:content.description: Foreign Minister David Cameron met with Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to discuss defense ties between the UK and Australia as global conflict largely increases.

item.title: Scott Billingham's partner makes an emotional plea to find him
item.description: Scott Billingham's partner makes an emotional plea to find him when he disappeared following a night of drinking.

media:content.media:title: Scott Billingham's partner makes an emotional plea to find him
media:content.description: Scott Billingham's partner makes an emotional plea to find him when he disappeared following a night of drinking.

item.title: Suspected migrants seen arriving in Dover after channel incident
item.description: A group thought to be migrants were brought in to Dover, Kent following an isolated incident in the Channel. A migrant was stabbed and taken to hospital after crossing the channel in a small boat, according to reports.

media:content.media:title: Suspected migrants seen arriving in Dover after channel incident
media:content.description: A group thought to be migrants were brought in to Dover, Kent following an isolated incident in the Channel. A migrant was stabbed and taken to hospital after crossing the channel in a small boat, according to reports.

item.title: Pauline Hanson repeats her most shocking ever comment to immigration
item.description: Pauline Hanson repeats her most shocking EVER comment - and claims she was 'right' - as she calls for Australia to stop all immigration.

media:content.media:title: Pauline Hanson repeats her most shocking ever comment to immigration
media:content.description: Pauline Hanson repeats her most shocking EVER comment - and claims she was 'right' - as she calls for Australia to stop all immigration.

item.title: House of Lords inflicts defeat against Government's Rwanda Bill
item.description: The House of Lords have inflicted a fresh defeat against the Government's Rwanda Bill voting by 271 to 228, majority 43, to press their demand that the legislation has "due regard" for domestic and international law.

media:content.media:title: House of Lords inflicts defeat against Government's Rwanda Bill
media:content.description: The House of Lords have inflicted a fresh defeat against the Government's Rwanda Bill voting by 271 to 228, majority 43, to press their demand that the legislation has "due regard" for domestic and international law.

item.title: Lord Stewart of Dirleton criticises Tory's Rwanda bill
item.description: Government law officer Lord Stewart of Dirleton has criticised the Tory administration over the Rwanda Bill. He said: 'It is not our intention to block the bill, but the Commons must reflect on what the Lords have said'.

media:content.media:title: Lord Stewart of Dirleton criticises Tory's Rwanda bill
media:content.description: Government law officer Lord Stewart of Dirleton has criticised the Tory administration over the Rwanda Bill. He said: 'It is not our intention to block the bill, but the Commons must reflect on what the Lords have said'.

item.title: Dave Sharma delivers his speech in Parliament on housing crisis
item.description: Senator Dave Sharma delivers his speech in Parliament addressing the housing crisis due to result of mass immigration

media:content.media:title: Dave Sharma delivers his speech in Parliament on housing crisis
media:content.description: Senator Dave Sharma delivers his speech in Parliament addressing the housing crisis due to result of mass immigration

item.title: Biden says to 'jump on Air Force One' for cheap prescription drugs
item.description: Biden offers chance to fly on Air Force One to BAGHDAD to get cheap prescription drugs in Arizona swing state.
